Module contents¶

ada_hub.clean_exit(status, should_rem_pid=True)[source]¶

A function that - when called - will cleanly exit the AdaHub application. On a clean exit the application will remove the saved PID file, and report its status.

Parameters

  • status (int) – Either 1 or 0. 0 means everything went as expected. 1 means an error or exception occurred.

  • should_rem_pid (bool) – Should the program attempt to remove the file PID located in the program’s ‘run’ directory? (Defaults to True)

Returns

None
